summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 FLEETWOOD PIONEER.  THE VEHICLE HAS A DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR, MODEL RM2662.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FROM DOMETIC ADVISING HIM NOT TO USE THE REFRIGERATOR DUE TO A POSSIBILITY OF FIRE.  THE CONTACT SCHEDULED AN APPOINTMENT WITH DOMETIC TO HAVE THE EQUIPMENT REPLACED AND WAS INFORMED THAT THEY WOULD SERVICE THE VEHICLE ON-SITE FOR A SMALL FEE OF $15.  HOWEVER, THE SERVICE REPAIRMAN NEVER SHOWED UP ON THE AGREED UPON SERVICE DATE.  THE CONTACT ATTEMPTED FOR THREE WEEKS TO RESCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT WITH DOMETIC.  NO REPAIRS HAVE BEEN MADE AND DOMETIC HAS YET TO RETURN THE CONTACT'S CALL.  HE IS NOT UTILIZING THE REFRIGERATOR AS ADVISED BY DOMETIC.  THE PART NUMBER WAS UNKNOWN.
